# Comparing Excel Chart Making with R's

Charlie Sturr

For my community contribution project, I revisited our old homework assignment for Seattle pets. After working in consulting for 4 years, I have spent way too many hours staring at Excel spreadsheets, and so I wanted to see what it would be like to try and recreate our homework assignment using Excel. You can see how this went in my medium post here: https://medium.com/@charlie.sturr/differences-between-r-and-excel-a-look-at-seattle-pets-data-5c8ed5fdeebf
